Note:
See Lawley (1880)
XLawley, Stephen Willoughby. Breviarum ad usum insignis ecclesiae Eboracensis. Vol. 1. Surtees Society 71 (1880), col. 334.
_description: ‘Popule meus quid feci tibi’ — eleven quatrains (abab)

CamJes13.First Lines:
My folk now ansuere me qwat haue I to the gyltqwat myȝth I
                    more a doon for te þan I haue ful fylt…
CamJes13.Last Lines:
…bysylyche I ȝaf the lyȝth bothe be day &
                    nyȝthfor thys þa hast me doon to deth al ȝens the
                    ryȝth

NLS18721.First Lines:
Mi folk nou ansuere mean seþ wat is my
                    gilth…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…& on an hey hil þu henge meal þe werld on me to
                    wonder
NLS18721.Note: Nine stanzas in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook.

Luria,  Maxwell Sidney,  and  Richard L. Hoffman, eds.
